Swift.description: Increases Movement Speed for all nearby Slayers when your weapon is sheathed. At higher levels, temporarily retains some of that increase after unsheathing.

1.description: While sheathed, grants +{{percentMovementSpeed}}% movement speed to all nearby Slayers

2.description: While sheathed, grants +{{percentMovementSpeed}}% movement speed to all nearby Slayers

3.description: While sheathed, grants +{{percentMovementSpeed}}% movement speed to all nearby Slayers

4.description: While sheathed, grants +{{percentMovementSpeed}}% movement speed to all nearby Slayers. Half of this effect persists on you for {{persistTime}} seconds after unsheathing.

5.description: While sheathed, grants +{{percentMovementSpeed}}% movement speed to all nearby Slayers. Half of this effect persists on you for {{persistTime}} seconds after unsheathing.

6.description: While sheathed, grants +{{percentMovementSpeed}}% movement speed to all nearby Slayers. Half of this effect persists on you for {{persistTime}} seconds after unsheathing.

Swift.name: Swift

Tactician.description: After dodging through 3 attacks, grant all nearby slayers bonus wound damage.

1.description: After dodging through an attack {{dodgeCount}} times, grant all nearby slayers +{{percentWoundDamage}}% wound damage based on their core damage for {{woundDamageTime}} seconds.

2.description: After dodging through an attack {{dodgeCount}} times, grant all nearby slayers +{{percentWoundDamage}}% wound damage based on their core damage for {{woundDamageTime}} seconds.

3.description: After dodging through an attack {{dodgeCount}} times, grant all nearby slayers +{{percentWoundDamage}}% wound damage based on their core damage for {{woundDamageTime}} seconds.

5.description: After dodging through an attack {{dodgeCount}} times, grant all nearby slayers +{{percentWoundDamage}}% wound damage based on their core damage for {{woundDamageTime}} seconds.

6.description: After dodging through an attack {{dodgeCount}} times, grant all nearby slayers +{{percentWoundDamage}}% wound damage based on their core damage for {{woundDamageTime}} seconds.

Tactician.name: Tactician

Water.description: Move like Water. Dodging through a Behemoth's attacks grants resolve and damage reduction against the next one.

1.description: After dodging through a Behemoth's Attack, you will be immune to stagger and take {{percentDamageReduction}}% less damage from the next Behemoth attack within 45 seconds.

2.description: After dodging through a Behemoth's Attack, you will be immune to stagger and take {{percentDamageReduction}}% less damage from the next Behemoth attack within 45 seconds.
